name: expenses
script:
x = frappe.get_doc("Expense Claim Type", doc.expense_type)
doc.expense_account = x.accounts[0].default_account

name: expense submit
script:
x = frappe.new_doc("Journal Entry")
x.posting_date = doc.posting_date
x.user_remark = f"مصروف رقم : {doc.name}\n{doc.description}"

x.append("accounts", {
    "account": doc.expense_account,
    "debit_in_account_currency": doc.amount,
})

x.append("accounts", {
    "account": doc.account,
    "credit_in_account_currency": doc.amount,
})
x.save()
doc.journal_no = x.name
x.submit()

name: expense delete
expense cancel
